allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add ICA (Ideal Contact Advocates) Networking Feature

Implemented a comprehensive LinkedIn contact management system to help users
categorize and track their professional network by interview opportunity potential.

Features:
- LinkedIn Connections CSV import with drag & drop
- Automatic contact categorization (High/Medium/Low Potential)
- Interactive contact management table with search and filtering
- Statistics dashboard showing contact distribution
- Inline editing for categories and notes
- Contact interaction tracking (optional)

Backend:
- New API routes: /api/ica/* for contact management
- LinkedIn CSV parser service with validation
- Database schema with 3 tables + statistics view
- Session-based contact isolation

Frontend:
- New "Networking" tab in main navigation
- Responsive UI matching JobMatch AI design
- Real-time category updates and statistics
- Search/filter functionality with debouncing

Database:
- linkedin_contacts table for contact storage
- contact_import_batches for upload tracking
- contact_interactions for networking history
- ica_stats view for aggregated statistics

Dependencies:
- csv-parse for CSV file parsing
- uuid, zod, pg for data handling

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
